original_title: Today I Will Be the Bread
overview: A naked boy surveys the scene. An orange, a loaf of bread, a clock. A pair of hands, a cigarette, and a cloud of smoke. A series of nested dolls, at the center is a private ritual. The room becomes the bread, the bread becomes the boy, and the orange takes on a life of its own. The clock keeps time. - Eyeworks Festival
title: Today I Will Be the Bread
